    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImage(View view)
      gets an image from the camera app to be added to the expense item
      void categoryOnClick(View view)
      this method opens a category dialog list from which the user can choose from the category options
      void currencyOnClick(View view)
      this method opens a dialog list from the which the user can choose a currency
      void deleteImage(View view)
      this method deletes a previously added image
      void editItem()
      the method edits an existing expense item with any updated values
      void onCheckBoxClicked(View view)
      reacts when the flag checkbox is clicked, sets the flag boolean to true if it was unclicked and to false if it was previously unchecked.
      boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) 
      void onDoneButtonClick(View view)
      this method delegates responsibility to either the addItem method or to the editItem method depending on the option provided in the getExtra
      void onImageCheckBoxClick(View view)
      reacts when image check box is clicked by deleting the image if the box is set to unchecked, and opening the camera app if it was checked.
      void onLocationClick(View view)
      reacts to the location check box, when going from unchecked to checked opens up the geolocation dialog box asking the user if they want a remote location of their current gps location.

      • onLocationClick

        public void onLocationClick(View view)
        reacts to the location check box, when going from unchecked to checked opens up the geolocation dialog box asking the user if they want a remote location of their current gps location. if the box goes from checked to unchecked it deletes the current added location
